title: YouTube Scraper Input
description: Provide a YouTube video URL to scrape its transcript, metadata, links, and capture still frames.

videoUrl.title: YouTube Video URL
videoUrl.description: Full YouTube URL (e.g. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ) or just the video ID.

language.title: Transcript Language
language.description: ISO language code for the transcript (e.g. 'en', 'de', 'es'). Falls back to auto-generated captions.

captureFrames.title: Capture Still Frames
captureFrames.description: Whether to capture still images from the video at key timestamps.

maxFrames.title: Maximum Frames
maxFrames.description: Maximum number of still frames to capture.

frameIntervalSeconds.title: Frame Interval (seconds)
frameIntervalSeconds.description: Interval between frame captures when the video has no chapters. Ignored if the video has chapters.
